name: Right Entrance Parking Lot
description: The parking lot is beside the GO bus stop and has a 5-minute walk to the J Wing building and an 8-minute walk to the S Wing building.

name: Left Entrance Parking Lot
description: The parking lot is beside the Oakville Transit bus stop and has an 8-minute walk to the S Wing building.

name: Residence Parking Lot
description: The parking lot is a 5-minute walk to Residence, Sheridan Conference Centre, and a 5-minute walk to the Learning Commons.

name: Athletics Parking Lot (1)
description: The parking lot is right beside the Sheridan Athletics building.

name: Athletics Parking Lot (2)
description: The parking lot is right beside the Sheridan Athletics building.

name: A Wing Parking Lot
description: The parking lot is a 2-minute walk to the A Wing building.

name: AA Wing Parking Lot
description: The parking lot is a 1-minute walk to the AA Wing building.

name: Main Entrance Parking Lot
description: The parking lot is a 3-minute walk to the main school entrance. It also leads to the D Wing building.
